solution_line_template: The combined length of all the rope is {combined_length} feet because {rope1} + {rope2} + ({rope3_length} x {rope3_count}) + {rope4} = <<{rope1}+{rope2}+({rope3_length}*{rope3_count})+{rope4}={combined_length}>>{combined_length}
He loses {total_knot_loss} feet from the knots because {num_knots} x {loss_per_knot} = <<{num_knots}*{loss_per_knot}={total_knot_loss}>>{total_knot_loss}
The final length is {final_length} feet because {combined_length} - {total_knot_loss} = <<{combined_length}-{total_knot_loss}={final_length}>>{final_length}
